int Header_Task::recv ( ACE_Message_Block * message,
ACE_Time_Value * timeout ) [protected, virtual]
 

Receive data upstream.

Tasks on the reader (upstream) side will be receiving data that came from the peer.

Reimplemented from Protocol_Task.

int Header_Task::send ( ACE_Message_Block * message,
ACE_Time_Value * timeout ) [protected, virtual]
 

Send data downstream.

Tasks on the writer (downstream) side of the stream are called upon to send() data that will ultimately go to the peer.

Reimplemented from Protocol_Task.
